page.title: 15THE MINERS' STRIKE
page.content: For almost the whole of the last 12 months the miners at our local pit, North Gawber Colliery, were on strike. For most of the time everything was quite peaceful but, early one morning, when it was rumoured that some miners were going back to work, large numbers of pickets gathered outside the pit gates. These are right opposite our school. When we arrived at school there was the smouldering remains of a dumper truck blocking the entrance and large numbers of miners gathered around the entrance.
